titleStmt.title: Description of British Library, Or 2554: Perushim (פרושים)

notesStmt.note: Abu l-Faraj Ya'ḳub: inscribed with a date of 1004-1005, Ramlah, folio 95v.
Yesha῾yah ben Tsaliḥ ben ῾Azaryahu: inscribed, folio 25r.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The commentary of Japheth ben Ali ha-Levi on the Song of Songs and Ruth (fragments).

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; ruled lines: 11 15; written lines: 11 15; Uniform layout. The diacritic points are generally added.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: A Naskhi hand of the early 11th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Ruth & Canticles with Yefet's Commentary. Hebrew & Arabic. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2554.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), an antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Library from him on 08 July 1882, folio [96v].
